Html:
Hi there. I've been trying to play ARDominos but there is problem with the PLAY mode (ADD and EDIT work ok). I just can't shoot out the balls. The thing is that they are appearing somewhere (the ball counter is going up) but I cannot see them. Positioning the camera in a wierd way the balls appear, but they do not shoot out, it's like they just fall down from the camera (mostly missing the marker)

I thought someone had the same problem and can help me out here. I've been through the tutorials and everyting else seems fine.
